title: sap-features-hub
description: Explore managed storage services that are based on the OpenZFS file system. Get centralized storage spaces in just a few clicks to store or back up your data and files.
guide1Description: Find out how to manage a HA-NAS solution in the OVHcloud Control Panel

guide2Description: Find out how to mount a NAS via an NFS share
guide3Title: Mounting your NAS on Windows Server via CIFS
guide3Description: Find out how to mount a NAS on Windows Server using CIFS protocol
